title: Seisen Cerberus: Ryuukoku no Fatalit√©s (Cerberus)
synopsis: Maintaining a delicate balance of power, the kingdoms of Amoria, Ishilfen, and Vanrodis rule over the continent of Kuna'anh. Even the slightest hint of trouble in one country could spark a continent-wide war. However, their one common fear is the evil dragon Daganzord, whose only meaning of existence is to devour and destroy all life.
voices: ['Matsuoka, Yoshitsugu', 'Ichimichi, Mao', 'Ise, Mariya', 'Uchida, Maaya', 'Kusunoki, Taiten', 'Numakura, Manami', 'Ueda, Youji', 'Omoro, Masayuki', 'Kawasaki, Meiko', 'Sakuya, Shunsuke']
staff: [['Kondou, Nobuhiro', ['Director']], ['Haraguchi, Noboru', ['Sound Director']], ['Suzuki, Yuuji', ['Episode Director']], ['Itou, Fumio', ['Episode Director']]]
